repnme.cdata!:
Rwanda - Bugesera Est Gisaka - Migongo
            Mixed Farming and Rural Development Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would provide: (a) spraying
            equipment and insecticides for tsetse fly eradication; (b)
            field extension services and infrastructure; (c)
            construction and upgrading of access and feeder roads; (d)
            drinking water distribution systems for the human population
            and livestock; (e) improved social infrastructure, including
            schools and health centers; (f) two finishing ranches,
            expansion of an existing breeding ranch, and improved
            livestock marketing through establishment of stock routes
            and a pilot finishing ranch; (g) a research station and
            pilot irrigation scheme in northern Gisaka; (h) technical
            assistance, including training and feasibility studies.

docna.cdata!:
Rwanda - Bugesera Est Gisaka - Migongo Mixed
            Farming and Rural Development Project
